mapper.select: select count(*) as bet_count,sum(amount) as betamount,sum(amount) as validamount,sum(wins) as winlose from ds_guangfang_lottery

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(d.bet_time,'%Y-%m-%d') bet_time, count(1) bet_count, SUM(d.amount) betamount,SUM(d.wins) winlose, SUM(d.amount) validamount FROM ds_guangfang_lottery d
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(d.bet_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
